title: Apple headset remains likely to adopt Micro OLED as Samsung develops ‘hologram’ competitor
content:
While we wait for Apple’s rumored headset with mixed reality capabilities to be unveiled this year, it seems like Samsung is taking another approach for a future product betting on holograms instead.

more…

The post Apple headset remains likely to adopt Micro OLED as Samsung develops ‘hologram’ competitor appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Another publication corroborates Apple's upcoming headset featuring Micro OLED displays and M1-like processor.
